comment: This was my second time with Professor Prokopiev and she really is one of my favorite teachers at KSU. Her class lectures are a little boring but she did cancel class on Fridays and really cares about her students. She gives extra credit at the end of the semester and will extend due dates for students that struggle in her class. Great teacher!
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Caring--So many papers

comment: Professor Prokopiev is a great teacher who is willing to put in a lot of her own time and effort to see her students succeed. She assigns a bunch of essays but spends most of the in- class time teaching tricks and tips on how to complete them. She gives extra credit at the end of the semester and does give bumps to students she knows and likes.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--EXTRA CREDIT--So many papers

comment: She is a nice lady, but gives too many essays. If she asks you a question, any answer you give will be the right answer. She will make write 3 4-page essays and one 6-page essay and she grades them hard
really helpful, but prepare for a lot of essays. she is caring and funny.
She really makes sure that students are taken care of and get the help they need. Lots of essays, but its an English class and youre gonna get that anywhere you go.
